name: Momodora II
description:
MOMODORA II is the second installment in the Momodora series.This sequel is much more polished and improved in every aspect in comparison with the first Momodora. It also abandoned the previous arcade-like progression for some gameplay that focuses slightly more on exploration.Momodora II follows the story of Momo, a priestess who is on a mission to banish evil nearby her home village.Cover artwork was drawn by Temmie Chang!I hope you enjoy it!
Troubleshooting
1 - Controller SupportUnfortunately, this game does not support any controllers natively. I recommend using a program called "antimicro" that allows you to bind keyboard keys to controller buttons.2- If you are having trouble running the game, please try the following:Open Task Manager, go to the "Services" tab and disable "Spooler".Make sure your .NET framework, DirectX, Audio drivers, and Video drivers are updated.Alternatively, try running the game with XP compatibility mode or in Admin mode.
